discourse_list.title: DeFi insurance platform Uno Re launches cover portal for crypto assets

content.content: This is important to keep in mind. I think (hope) at this point people realize there is a problem finding insurance in this space when it comes to insuring your assets. I cannot vouch for it but thought this information might be useful to some.    The Block    DeFi insurance platform Uno Re launches cover portal for crypto assets The company said it is addressing a need in the DeFi space—accessible insurance amid the potential for hacking attacks.

I think it is important the issue of chain insurance, because no one responds for the errors that programmers may have at the time of developing something with failures, everything is at your own risk.
Yes, there is a huge need for all types of insurance in this space. We are setting the path going forward.
That is correct, if there is to secure funds, but I don’t know that they also act in case of a massive hacking or some catastrophic event.

And the need for insurance in the crypto/defi/dao space goes beyond just securing funds and protecting the assets. There are liability issues amongst other things. This Uno Re platform seems to only pertain to people seeking to insure their personal crypto assets. But generally there is a huge need for insurers willing to provide coverage in this space for various things. This is just an example of how we can build the future of this space. Another need that must be addressed.
